类 GenericFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.catalina.servlet4preview.GenericFilter
  • 所有已实现的接口:

    直接已知子类:
    HttpFilter
    已过时。 
    This class is not included in Tomcat 9 onwards. Users of this class should normally upgrade to Tomcat 9 and switch to the Servlet 4.0 API. If the functionality is required in Tomcat 8.5, then the Tomcat implementation classes should be used directly. This class may be removed from Tomcat 8.5.x some time after 30 September 2018.

    @Deprecated
public abstract class GenericFilter
extends Object
implements javax.servlet.Filter, javax.servlet.FilterConfig, Serializable

      • init

        public void init(javax.servlet.FilterConfig filterConfig)
          throws javax.servlet.ServletException
        已过时。 
        从接口复制的说明: javax.servlet.Filter
        Called by the web container to indicate to a filter that it is being placed into service. The servlet container calls the init method exactly once after instantiating the filter. The init method must complete successfully before the filter is asked to do any filtering work.

        The web container cannot place the filter into service if the init method either:

        • Throws a ServletException
        • Does not return within a time period defined by the web container
        指定者:
        init 在接口中 javax.servlet.Filter
        参数:
        filterConfig - The configuration information associated with the filter instance being initialised
        抛出:
        javax.servlet.ServletException - if the initialisation fails

      • init

        public void init()
          throws javax.servlet.ServletException
        已过时。 
        Convenience method for sub-classes to save them having to call super.init(config). This is a NO-OP by default.
        抛出:
        javax.servlet.ServletException - If an exception occurs that interrupts the Filter's normal operation

        public String getFilterName()
        已过时。 
        从接口复制的说明: javax.servlet.FilterConfig
        Get the name of the filter.
        指定者:
        getFilterName 在接口中 javax.servlet.FilterConfig
        返回:
        The filter-name of this filter as defined in the deployment descriptor.
